title: New: Krusoe – Rivers Run RIot
body:
Another hugely ambitious composition from Oxford’s **Krusoe** on his second offering, _Rivers Run Riot_.

Having impressed on his debut track, SOS, Rivers Run Riot finds him developing more of a sound of his own – merging languid, Tame Impala meets Radiohead sort of vibes, with an almost Brit-pop edge. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
